description: New downhill mountain biking trail built to IMBA standard in Fundy National Park
directions: Head to Fundy National Park, Head to the top of the hill toward North Chignecto, trailhead located on the south side of the 114 across from the N. Chignecto campground.The trail ends at the bottom of the hill near the Salt and Fir Center near the Golf Course.
title: WhiteTail
